author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kunshan Kersen Science & Technology says dividend payment date on April 24
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Kunshan Kersen Science & Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.25 yuan (before tax) per share and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.4 new shares for one share for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 23
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 24 and the dividend will be paid on April 24
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/YskKes
